item.title: Amy Poehler Calls Out the Oscars for Never Awarding Comedy Movies: ‘It’s Some Hot Bulls—. Comedy Is Not Easy’
item.description: Amy Poehler called out the Oscars on her “Good Hang” podcast for always ignoring comedy movies when it comes time to give out awards. Poehler’s latest episode featured Olivia Colman
